Officials cancel May Brimfield flea market due to coronavirus
BRIMFIELD - Out of concern for the threat of spreading coronavirus, selectmen have voted to cancel the May version of Brimfield Antiques Show & Flea Markets. On their webpage, the organizers of the event announced that the spring event was canceled. It was slated for May 12-17. "We are very sorry to that due to circumstances beyond our control ...

Pandemic forces Durham Rescue Mission to cancel Easter celebration for needy
Durham, N.C. — The Durham Rescue Mission's Easter celebration that typically provides food for thousands of people in need has been canceled because of the coronavirus outbreak, officials said Monday. The feast, clothes giveaway and Easter basket distribution has been an annual event for more than 40 years. Last year, about 2,000 people attended.
